div.style: background-color: #f93e3e; color:white;font-size: 20px !important; border-radius: 5px; display: inline-block; width: 110px; text-align: center; height: 40px; padding-top: 15px;font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-weight:600

div.div: Delete specific customer information using the customer id.
